scorePolicy:
Your class grade will be determined by either way: 

Option 1: Take TOEFL or TOEIC during this semester, and claim your class grade by presenting official transcript by finals week. 

Option 2: If you don’t have official TOEFL or TOEIC transcript, your class grade will be determined by: In-class test every week (10%); Homework: 彭蒙惠英語 (10%); Midterm & Final Exam: the best grade of two mock TOEIC tests (80%)
